section.name: s1
section.heading: Designation of marine parks
section.content: The areas shown in the approved maps specified in the Schedule are designated as marine parks.

section.name: s1
section.heading: Hoi Ha Wan Marine Park
section.content: That area delineated and coloured pink on the map (Plan No. MP/HHW) approved on 25 June 1996 by the Governor in Council and deposited in the Land Registry, the headquarters of the Agriculture, Fisheries and Conservation Department and the headquarters of the Marine Department.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Yan Chau Tong Marine Park
section.content: Those areas delineated and coloured pink on the map (Plan No. MP/YCT) approved on 25 June 1996 by the Governor in Council and deposited in the Land Registry, the headquarters of the Agriculture, Fisheries and Conservation Department and the headquarters of the Marine Department.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Sha Chau and Lung Kwu Chau Marine Park
section.content: That area delineated and coloured pink on the map (Plan No. MP/SHAA) approved on 29 October 1996 by the Governor in Council and deposited in the Land Registry, the headquarters of the Agriculture, Fisheries and Conservation Department and the headquarters of the Marine Department. (L.N. 486 of 1996)

section.name: s4
section.heading: Tung Ping Chau Marine Park
section.content: That area delineated and coloured pink on the map (Plan No. MP/TPC) approved on 10 July 2001 by the Chief Executive in Council and deposited in the Land Registry, the Tai Po New Territories Land Registry, the headquarters of the Agriculture, Fisheries and Conservation Department and the headquarters of the Marine Department. (L.N. 201 of 2001)
